profile.title: Profile
description: Highly motivated employee, with nearly 7 years of experience in the Software Development Industry
Constantly looking for progression, learning and achievement
Highly passionate about technology, computers and Software Engineering, learning new concepts and researching the subject
Hobbyist video game developer experienced in Unity and C#
Entire professional career built through self-directed learning and continuous self-improvement.

responsibilities: Key member of a 5-person team driving development projects that led to our successful acquisition by Siemens
Fullstack Software development integrating legacy systems with Siemens technology stack, learning new concepts and adjusting to corporate culture

Directed and led the full lifecycle of production deployments, significantly improving system reliability and robustness using Docker, Ansible, GitLabCI, Linux automated installation (Preseed), bash scripts and CI/CD development
Responsible for integrating Siemens UI/UX design into our Software using React.js, Typescript, Vite
Fullstack Software development using React.js, Typescript, Python, GitLabCI, Linux Preseed, bash scripting
Full responsibility for features from Design, Development, Testing to Deployment
Development of basic UI and UI Automation using Node, React
Development of CI/CD pipelines using Python and Jenkins
Data analysis for Algo team, Python scripting for automating tools
